committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill to provide an additional year for the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Commission to complete the preparation of a development and management plan.

summary.text: Extends the time within which the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Commission must complete a development and management plan for the East Saint Louis, Illinois, portion of the Memorial to August 23, 1987.

titles.title: A bill to provide an additional year for the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Commission to complete the preparation of a development and management plan.
